title: Swap two numbers
contentHtml:
Write a program to swap two numbers

Input  : 10 20
Output : 20 10

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)

a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)
markdown:
## Write a program to swap two numbers

```
Input  : 10 20
Output : 20 10
```

---

<CodeBlock>

```cpp
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)
```

```java
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)
```

```js
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
a, b = b, a
print(a)
print(b)
```

a = int(input())

a = int(input())
